name: Create Google Sheet rows from Recurly transactions
description: Every time a new Recurly transaction is created, Make will automatically add a new row to a Google Sheet. This example uses the spreadsheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1P9B7XLO7TVO9X3G_tKYBpUSKkg_P-LZq0IJW61xkGL0/edit#gid=0).
